string.text:
A popular choice in the Zone, flesh meat has a good taste and high nutritional value. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity. Source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +584 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+3%)
Flesh meat

The most popular meat in the Zone. Nutritious and hardly contaminated. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity. Source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +646 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+2%)
Boar chop

Meat of mutated dogs is used as a cheap alternative to the more popular boar meat. The scientists have enough samples already, which limits its use as a commodity. Source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +202 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+1%)
Dog meat

Pseudodog meat is a common dietary component in the Zone. Tasty, with high nutritional value, a popular choice among stalkers. Can be sold to the scientists. Source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +264 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+1%)
Pseudodog meat

Bloodsucker meat is stringy and thus not suited for eating. Although bloodsuckers are fearsome beasts, the price for the meat is not very high due to its limited uses. Can be sold to the scientists. Source of animal fat for gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] high-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +541 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+2%)
Bloodsucker meat

As is widely known, snorks originate from humans, so eating their meat is considered cannibalistic and immoral. However, certain factions, such as bandits and mercenaries, include it in their meals so as to show their superiority over other groups. Can be sold to the scientists who make better use of it.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +408 mSv
Snork hand

A heavy chunk of chimera meat. Since chimeras are considered one of the most dangerous creatures, their meat is highly valued by veteran stalkers who are willing to buy it for fairly high prices. The cook on Skadovsk uses this meat as one of the ingredients of the so called masculine meal, although only few claim that it's better than boar meat. Can be sold to the scientists. Furthermore, it provides the best quality animal fat available in the Zone which can be used for the purposes of very effective gun lubrication.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] high-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +665 mSv
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication (+4%)
Chunk of chimera meat

A small portion of a mutated rodent's body. A cheap and commonly found food that is said to strengthen your heart after being cooked in open fire. Can be sold to the scientists.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[default]Stalkers are advised to refrain from eating raw meat as animals and mutants in the Zone are likely to be carrying trichinellosis or brucellosis. These diseases are transmitted by ingesting infected meat. The symptoms include fever, fatigue and appetite loss, all of which are extremely dangerous given the conditions in the Zone. Abscesses, fungal growth and tumors on the surface of the body indicate that the meat is infected and should be disposed of.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier mutant meat
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] cookable
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] toxic food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +121 mSv
Tushkano meat

Mutated, swollen eye of a flesh has a number of strange characteristics, the most interesting and potentially useful of which is the ability to repair even severe damage sustained to the organ. The specifics of this process are hitherto unknown, although the discovery of mechanism behind it would most certainly revolutionize modern medicine by providing cures for many diseases. You can play a part in hastening the progress of science and save the lives of innocent people by selling eyes of fleshes to the scientists.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Flesh eye

Hoofs of boars can be used to produce various drugs, for example anti-radiation serums.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Boar leg

Resistance of mutant dogs' skin to electricity and chemical agents has been the object of scientific interest for a long time. Due to the absence of fat tissue, the tail is especially suited for lab tests.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Dog tail

Rumor has it that a certain trend has recently taken over the fashion world: fur from the tails of pseudodogs. The fur is reportedly so soft that it has no equal. It is also said that it will keep you warm even in most vicious snowstorms and blizzards. For these reasons, pseudodog tails are in high demand.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Pseudodog tail

Bloodsucker tentacles contain a special gland which produces an enzyme capable of dissolving the skin and simultaneously preventing blood from clotting. Discovering the enzyme's composition could be the cornerstone of a whole series of great medical advances. Some stalkers tend to use bloodsucker teeth to make necklaces and charms. It is thus safe to say that bloodsucker jaw is one of the most popular pieces of jewelry found in the Zone.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Bloodsucker jaw

Snork feet and legs contain a huge number of highly elastic tendons. This explains the beast's ability to perform its characteristic long leaps at its prey. The scientists still look for their potential uses, and will be grateful for each pair you bring to their base.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+3%)
Snork leg

Masks worn by snorks are apparently a version of GP-5 Soviet-made gas mask which was commonly used by soldiers as well as research and utility crews operating in the Zone when the second Chernobyl disaster occurred. Some of these people were working in numerous underground laboratories in which they were sealed from the outside world and exposed to tremendous amounts of radiation, which produced a creature we know as snork. The mask, although broken beyond use (with cracked lenses and punctured filter hose), is still in demand by the scientific community. It can also be used to repair parts of outfit, but this process results in all remaining organic material being lost.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] broken beyond repair
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+4%)
Snork mask

The horn of a chimera. Its exact molecular composition is unknown, but we know for a fact that it is as durable and sharp as a diamond, which explains why the beast is able to cut through armor with ease. This item is in high demand as it is visibly similar to a rhino horn. A few poachers even arrived in the Zone with the aim of acquiring the horn and selling it on the black market. To their surprise, however, chimeras are nowhere as docile as rhinos, so they never made it back. All that remains of them are some unpleasant memories and personal belongings which indicate where they were ripped to pieces by these vicious mutants.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Chimera horn

The claw of a chimera. Its exact molecular composition is unknown, but we know for a fact that it is as durable and sharp as a diamond, which explains why the beast is able to cut through armor with ease.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Chimera claw

The head of a tushkano. The scientists would like to study it in order to identify which creature tushkanos originated from.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Tushkano head

Controllers have potent mental powers and it's safe to say that these powers have their origin in their brain. What's interesting, every mutant possessing abilities related to psy waves has a brain of similar structure. The scientists will pay handsomely for this tissue. It has a smell reminiscent of a sour pumpkin.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] extremely valuable
Controller brain tissue

The controller seems to use its hand when mentally attacking its prey. Scientists will gladly examine it in the hope of finding the source of mutation responsible for its psy-related powers. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Controller hand

Cats in the Zone are extremely large in comparison to their pet cousins and are in fact very dangerous predators, capable of moving without a sound, no matter the surface. A cat's tail is a symbol of awareness.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Cat tail

Burer's hand seems to play a vital role in the use of the telekinetic powers by the creature. Scientists will gladly examine it in the hope of finding the source of mutation. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Burer hand

This is a hand of a creature called old zombie - former human beings who lived or worked in the Exclusion Zone and were subjected to extreme amounts of radiation and psy-influence when the second Chernobyl incident occurred. After many years of being in this state, they possess only a frail body with bones and half-rotten flesh clearly visible. For this reason, the creatures very much resemble animated dead bodies, however they are very much alive and almost permanently hungry and thus can become a threat when encountered in packs. Severed hand not only constitutes a scientific research material but in many cases can also be used to identify the person to whom the hand belonged.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] common scientific specimen
Zombie hand

A severed hand of an izlom - an extremely deformed humanoid mutant. It is certain that these creatures used to be humans and that they are the direct result of the second Chernobyl incident. From the remains of their clothing we can deduce that izloms originate from prisoner population that was stationed the Exclusion Zone and sentenced for forced labor. Since the deformation of the body is almost identical in case of all izloms, it is supposed that when the exposure took place all subjects were in the same body position - either because they were in the process of being transported or because someone purposely placed them so. All specimens encountered so far were male and sterile. Hence it can be safely assumed that the izlom population is unable to reproduce, and their number in the Zone is steadily getting lower. For this reason, at present date they remain one of the most rarely encountered type of mutant, and highly deformed, right hand of an izlom constitutes a valuable research object.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Izlom hand

A hand of a pseudogiant may prove useful for the scientists who will gladly examine it. Smells like old socks and bad kimchee.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Pseudogiant hand

An eye of the pseudogiant has the appearance of a larger human eye, but with a few differences. It has a multi-colored iris and its tear glands are exceptionally well developed. Pseudogiants are known to lacrimate profusely and regularly, but we don't know whether this is a result of some physiological process or a by-product of the psychology of the creature. In any case, the scientists would be very eager to lay their hands on it, so they're willing to pay a high price for any specimen.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very rare scientific specimen
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable
Pseudogiant eye

%c[0,140,140,140]INTENDED USE:
 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] sharpening knives (1 unit)
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] sharpening pocket knives, field cutlery, grooming blades (1 unit) 
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] sharpening shovels (2 units) 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]While the majority of less-experienced stalkers consider crows as nothing more than pests that are to be disposed of, those more insightfull ones acknowledge their usefulness in tackling a variety of challenges which life in the Zone is so very much full of. While presence of living crow herd can often prove invaluable when navigating and evading danger among the empty streets of Chernobyl and Pripyat, it's only after their death when true value is manifested.
 
The keratin layer which surrounds beaks of most bird species found on Earth - in case of Chernobyl crows becomes harder, almost rock-like with each year that the animal survives among the radioactive willderness. For specimens older than 2 years it's often already solid enough to constitute an effective sharpening material for common metal tools or blades made of cast iron or military-grade steel alike. 
 
It is not known why despite massive crow genocide - which initially resulted from discovery of this fact - the population of crows in the Zone has seemingly not only not shrunk but even expanded. It is believed that accelerated adaptation, typical among Zone's fauna - in case of crows has provided them with not only sped-up reproduction cycle resulting in up to 4 egg lays during each nesting season and prolonged life-span of up to 20 years, but also has given them extra-ordinary inteligence manifested especially when many crows are gathered around in close proximity to each other.
 
This last feat has led to rather peculiar custom among the some of the Zone-dwellers which - as rumor has it - has been introduced by the very first stalkers who arrived in the Zone after the second incident. The ritual - aptly reffered to as "The Beak" is said to comprise of taking a powder made from pulverisded beak of the eldest crow in the herd and creating a special mixture. When concoction is consumed in the middle of night accompanied by 'arcane' incantations, allows one's mind to temporarly merge with multi-consciousness shared by all crows in the Zone. It is not known what happens to fragile human mind when it is subjected to such an experience, but some speculate that this is what has led Stalker named Noah to build his Arc in a desperate attempt to preserve whatever possible, from the inevitable cataclysm that is about to once again fall upon this already devastated land.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mutated body part
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very common scientific specimen
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for repairing equipment
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] not usable below condition level: %c[0,170,170,170]5%
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] base condition gain: %c[0,170,170,170]6%
 
%c[0,140,140,140]SUPPORTED MATERIALS:
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] sharpening stones %c[0,170,170,170]+11%
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] steel wool %c[0,170,170,170]+5%
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] 'diamond powder' %c[0,170,170,170]+28%
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] cleaning solvents %c[0,170,170,170]+3-7%
Mutated crow beak
